episodes.title: Murderess Replay: #51 Apple Colorists, Kevin Hart and Joe Rogan and (The Manson Women)
episodes.description: Tell me what stayed with you—I read every message. Your thoughts might even shape what the Quiet Jury hears next on Patreon. 🎙 Murderess Replay: Ep. 51 — The Manson Women August 1969. The world remembers the names Tate and LaBianca — but behind Charles Manson’s cult of personality stood a group of young women whose devotion turned deadly. In this Murderess Replay, host Sidney Smith revisits the story of Susan Atkins, Patricia Krenwinkel, and Leslie Van Houten — women who followed Manson into violence and infamy. Through trial transcripts, witness accounts, and the haunting image of a cult turned murderous, we explore how loyalty, manipulation, and identity left a permanent scar on American history. Plus, more.
